name: design
trans: a plan or drawing

name: handle
trans: to deal with, have responsibility for, or be in charge of something

name: propeller
trans: a device with two or more blades that spin around to produce a force for moving the ship or aircraft to which it is attached

name: sustained
trans: continuing for a time

name: coarse
trans: rough and not smooth or soft

name: prolonged
trans: continuing for a long time

name: inflexibility
trans: the quality of being fixed and unable or unwilling to change

name: variable
trans: likely to change, or showing change or difference as a characteristic

name: pitch
trans: to throw something, esp. forcefully

name: blade
trans: the thin, flat cutting part of a tool or weapon

name: rotation
trans: the act of turning around a fixed point

name: cruise
trans: to travel at a continuous speed

name: reliably
trans: in a faithful manner

name: turbulence
trans: a state of confusion and lack of order

name: aviation
trans: the activity of flying aircraft, or of designing, producing, and maintaining them

name: confer
trans: to talk together and exchange ideas, often with the intention of reaching a decision about something

name: enthusiast
trans: someone who is very interested in and involved with a particular subject or activity

name: isolation
trans: the condition of being alone, especially when this makes you feel unhappy

name: curiosity
trans: an eager desire to know or learn about something

name: revolutionize
trans: to produce a very great or complete change in something
